Description_lang: Empowers your chosen aura for $d.$?a344218[$@spellname465: Damage reduction increased to ${-$s1-$465s2}%.][]$?a344219[$@spellname32223: Mount speed bonus increased to ${$s2+$32223s4}%.][]$?a344217[$@spellname183435: Increases healing received by $s3% while its effect is active.][]$?a344220[$@spellname317920: Affected allies immune to interrupts and silences.][]

description_blz.en_US: Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

description_blz.pt_BR: Potencializa sua aura escolhida por 8 s.

description_blz.es_ES: Potencia el aura de tu elección durante 8 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Повышает эффективность выбранной ауры на 8 сек.
description_blz.zh_TW: 強化你選擇的光環，持續8秒。
